pullRequest.title: CDPCP-1941. Only trigger user sync role refresh when needed
pullRequest.bodyText:
After setting role configs related to identity mapping, we no
longer trigger refresh when the values haven't changed (by
checking whether CM reports whether a refresh is required).

nodes.bodyText: setAzureCloudIdentityMapping is already a big method, could you refactor this part into a separate one, like refreshRoleIfStale
